channel.title: Getting Started on DC/OS Terraform Provider
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on DC/OS Terraform Provider

item.title: Installation
item.description: Installation There are various ways you can obtain the terraform-provider-dcs binary. Build and Install From Source Make sure Go, make and GoLangCI-Lint are installed. On Linux call PLATFORMS=linux make. On macOS call PLATFORMS=darwin make Copy the binary in terraform.d/plugins to ~/.terraform.d with cp -r terraform.d/plugin ~/.terraform.d.
